column5: caught this little monster a couple years ago        I'm wearing my hip waders and fishing vest and carrying a big downrigger rod when we go trick or treating he was trying to eat us after we told him sharks eat lots of fish LOL
For sure Nip.. I definitely miss those years!
LOL...nice post. Cute costume...the boys, are going out as Santa, a ninja, and....a woman (that one scares me a bit, lol!!!!)
I've got a Spider monkey from the Wizard of Oz and a Star Wars trooper at home! HH
Cute boy. I take it he takes after the wife?LOL JOKING!
We are lucky enough to have 5 little guys that we can spoil and send home...

SMART  LOL he definately got both of our best traits he's a little flirt to when we are out he's always smiling at all the pretty ladies I don't know were he gets that from :whistling:and his favorite toy is his john deere fishin rod
Thats so cool, cute shark! Nothing like joking around with your kid/s.
